AppPush.Title: [EN] Collapse Launcher Update Issue
AppPush.Message: Due to a bug in the launcher code, Collapse's update mechanism may not work or work incorrectly for some users. If you are still on 1.82.2 or below, please reinstall your launcher using link provided below. You will not lose your settings/game data. For more questions, please hit us up in GitHub discussion or issues. We're sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused.

AppPush.Title: [EN] Collapse Launcher Update Issue
AppPush.Message: Due to bug in the launcher code, some users might not be able to access certain game regions where the user has never been open. If you're still on 1.82.6 or below, please update your launcher via "Force Update" or by reinstall your launcher using the link provided below! You won't lose your settings/game data. For more questions, please hit us up in GitHub discussion or issues.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice about Pre-Download Availability
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
HoYoVerse has done some changes to the pre-download system, which resulted in the removal of ZIP archive for pre-download.
We have pushed an update to fix this issue, you should update your launcher to 1.83.0 to get the fix.
We are sorry for the inconvenience that this may have caused.
